channel.title: Radiology on Columbia DSI Scholars
channel.description: Recent content in Radiology on Columbia DSI Scholars

item.title: Statistical analysis of radiation dose parameters for interventional neuroradiology procedures
item.description: From May 2018 to September 2019, we prospectively recorded radiation exposure parameters for 634 neuro-procedures performed at a single, academic medical center. Procedures were performed with a biplane angiographic system.
